name: sigma-azure
description: Execute Synopsys Sigma Static Analysis within Azure Pipeline

scripts.build: npm run installAll && cd tasks/synopsys-sigma-task/ && npm run build
scripts.tick: node dev/tick.js && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json
scripts.installAll: npm install && npm dedupe && npm prune && cd tasks/synopsys-sigma-task/ && npm install && npm dedupe && npm prune

author: Synopsys, Inc.
